mapper.select: select * from inquiry order by u_idx
select * from inquiry order by u_idx desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry(user_id, category, user_name, email, phone, password, subject,content, f_name, write_date) values(${user_id}, ${category}, ${user_name}, ${email}, ${phone}, ${password}, ${subject}, ${content}, ${f_name}, now())
